text: haey yeung ban phdal morotk aoy puok del thleab ke chiahchean tisakheangkaet ning khanglich nei phendei del yeung ban thveu aoy vea meankar rik chamreun . peakyasanyea da laitakhchaoh robsa mcheasa anak( mou ham meat) ban bampenh tow aoy ambaur aisreael daoysaar puokke ban atthmot kanlongomk . haey yeung ban kamtech chaol nouv avei del hvie r aon ning baksaapuok robsa ke ban thveu ning avei del puokke ban ksang laeng
